description:
1、Vanessa Hudgens

A chambray skirt can be as versatile as your favorite pair of jeans, especially when paired with a bohemian crop top.一条布裙就像你最喜欢的牛仔裤一样百搭，特别是当你搭配了一件波西米亚风的露脐上衣时。

2、Blake Lively

Take notes from Lively who sticks to a neutral color palette for her print sundress and tennis shoes, then adds a pop of color with a canary yellow purse.看Lively做笔记啦！她坚持挑选中和色系的印花背心裙和网球鞋，再用浅黄色的包包来加入流行的颜色。

3、Dakota Fanning

Off-the-shoulder tops and dresses are super of-the-moment. Not to mention, they balance perfectly with a cute sun hat.当下超级流行的就是上身露肩的连衣裙。更不必说，它们完美平衡了可爱的太阳帽。

4、Anne Hathaway

Hathaway looks totally fresh braving an all-white look, plus she proves a fanny pack can, in fact, be fashionable in a cool texture or print.Hathaway勇敢穿着全白的装扮让她看起来非常清新，另外港真，她证明了有出色的材质或酷酷印花的腰包就很潮。

5、Kendall Jenner

Ball gowns can be worn in the daytime, according to Kendall Jenner who styles hers with a white eyelet crop top.大摆长裙也可以在白天穿，就像Kendall Jenner一样用一件白色网眼背心搭配。

6、Toni Garrn

The best way to wear stripes, yes or yes? 穿条纹的最好方式，对还是对？

7、Cara Delevingne

Consider toughening up a flirty romper with boyish accessories, like Delevingne's cap and high-top sneakers.想要一条色气的连体裤更硬派一点就搭配男孩子气的配饰，像是Delevingne这样的帽子和高帮运动鞋。

8、Alexa Chung

Chung's tailored ivory frock is a reminder that thrifted or vintage-inspired threads are especially charming during the warmer months.Chung的象牙色剪裁连衣裙让人想起节俭、复古的纺线，在温暖一些的月份里特别吸引人。

9、Lupita Nyong'o

Nyong'o looks especially lovely swirling around in her perfectly-tailored LWD—and you will too, trust.Nyong'o穿着完美剪裁的小白裙转圈的时候看起来特别可爱——你穿也会的，相信我。

10、Karlie Kloss

Kloss strikes the right balance between style and function by wearing a body-hugging, knee-length black dress with a leather backpack.Kloss穿紧身、及膝的黑色连衣裙搭配皮革双肩包，在时尚和功能之间达到了很好的平衡。

11、Sienna Miller

A classic navy sheath, comfy sandals, and a red lip are the key to nailing your holiday style: it's comfortable and still pulled together. 一件经典的深蓝色紧身服装，舒适的凉鞋，还有红唇💋就是打造你的假日风范的关键：不仅舒适而且（风格）达成统一。

12、Kate Bosworth

If you're worried that overalls are lacking any sort of sex appeal, look for them in a fitted shape that shows off your form.如果你担心背带裤会一点都不性感，那就找一条能展示你的曲线的合身款型吧。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 明星穿搭：夏天怎么穿，才能又高又瘦？②
